channel.title: oevl tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from oevl.

item.description: Testing the new laptop. A lightweight 13.3" HP Pavilion Aero with an AMD Ryzen 5 CPU plus Radeon Graphics, 8GB of RAM and a 512GB SSD
item.source:markdown: Testing the new laptop. A lightweight 13.3" HP Pavilion Aero with an AMD Ryzen 5 CPU plus Radeon Graphics, 8GB of RAM and a 512GB SSD

item.description: @webby2001 I have been listening to podcasts for about the same time, and as an audience member, this thread is enlightening for my understanding of the medium. @threadreaderapp please roll.
